001package reciprocal.number.complex;
002
003import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
004import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState;
005import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
006
007import ch.obermuhlner.math.big.BigDecimalMath;
008import java.io.Serial;
009import java.math.BigDecimal;
010import java.math.BigInteger;
011import java.math.MathContext;
012import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
013
014/**
015 * Immutable implementation of a complex number that uses {@link BigDecimal} as
016 * type for its real and imaginary part
017 *
018 * @since 0.0.1
019 */
020public final class BigComplex extends AbstractComplex<@NotNull BigDecimal, @NotNull BigComplex, @NotNull BigComplex,
021    @NotNull BigDecimal, @NotNull BigPolarForm> {
022    /**
023     * 0
024     *
025     * @since 0.0.1
026     */
027    public static final @NotNull BigComplex ZERO = ofReal(BigDecimal.ZERO);
028
029    /**
030     * 1
031     *
032     * @since 0.0.1
033     */
034    public static final @NotNull BigComplex ONE = ofReal(BigDecimal.ONE);
035
036    /**
037     * i
038     *
039     * @since 0.0.1
040     */
041    public static final @NotNull BigComplex I = ofImaginary(BigDecimal.ONE);
042
043    /**
044     * -1
045     *
046     * @since 0.0.1
047     */
048    public static final @NotNull BigComplex MINUS_ONE = ONE.negate();
049
050    /**
051     * -i
052     *
053     * @since 0.0.1
054     */
055    public static final @NotNull BigComplex MINUS_I = I.negate();
056
057    @Serial
058    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
059
060    /**
061     * Constructor
062     *
063     * @param real real part
064     * @param imaginary imaginary part
065     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code real == null}
066     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code imaginary == null}
067     * @since 0.0.1
068     */
069    public BigComplex(final @NotNull BigDecimal real, final @NotNull BigDecimal imaginary) {
070        super(real, imaginary);
071    }
072
073    /**
074     * Static factory method
075     *
076     * @param real real part
077     * @return real + 0 * i
078     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code real == null}
079     * @since 0.0.1
080     */
081    public static @NotNull BigComplex ofReal(final @NotNull BigDecimal real) {
082        return new BigComplex(real, BigDecimal.ZERO);
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * Static factory method
087     *
088     * @param imaginary imaginary part
089     * @return 0 + imaginary * i
090     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code imaginary == null}
091     * @since 0.0.1
092     */
093    public static @NotNull BigComplex ofImaginary(final @NotNull BigDecimal imaginary) {
094        return new BigComplex(BigDecimal.ZERO, imaginary);
095    }
096
097    @Override
098    public boolean isInvertible() {
099        return doesNotEqualByComparing(ZERO);
100    }
101
102    @Override
103    public @NotNull BigComplex add(final @NotNull BigComplex summand) {
104        requireNonNull(summand, "summand");
105        return new BigComplex(getReal().add(summand.getReal()), getImaginary().add(summand.getImaginary()));
106    }
107
108    /**
109     * Calculates the sum
110     *
111     * @param summand summand
112     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
113     * @return sum
114     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code summand == null}
115     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
116     */
117    public @NotNull BigComplex add(final @NotNull BigComplex summand, final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
118        requireNonNull(summand, "summand");
119        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
120        final var re = getReal().add(summand.getReal(), mathContext);
121        final var im = getImaginary().add(summand.getImaginary(), mathContext);
122        return new BigComplex(re, im);
123    }
124
125    @Override
126    public @NotNull BigComplex subtract(final @NotNull BigComplex subtrahend) {
127        requireNonNull(subtrahend, "subtrahend");
128        final var re = getReal().subtract(subtrahend.getReal());
129        final var im = getImaginary().subtract(subtrahend.getImaginary());
130        return new BigComplex(re, im);
131    }
132
133    /**
134     * Calculates the difference
135     *
136     * @param subtrahend subtrahend
137     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
138     * @return sum
139     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code subtrahend == null}
140     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
141     */
142    public @NotNull BigComplex subtract(final @NotNull BigComplex subtrahend, final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
143        requireNonNull(subtrahend, "subtrahend");
144        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
145        final var re = getReal().subtract(subtrahend.getReal(), mathContext);
146        final var im = getImaginary().subtract(subtrahend.getImaginary(), mathContext);
147        return new BigComplex(re, im);
148    }
149
150    @Override
151    public @NotNull BigComplex multiply(final @NotNull BigComplex factor) {
152        requireNonNull(factor, "factor");
153        final var re = getReal().multiply(factor.getReal()).subtract(getImaginary().multiply(factor.getImaginary()));
154        final var im = getReal().multiply(factor.getImaginary()).add(getImaginary().multiply(factor.getReal()));
155        return new BigComplex(re, im);
156    }
157
158    /**
159     * Calculates the product
160     *
161     * @param factor factor
162     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
163     * @return product
164     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code factor == null}
165     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
166     * @since 0.0.1
167     */
168    public @NotNull BigComplex multiply(final @NotNull BigComplex factor, final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
169        requireNonNull(factor, "factor");
170        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
171        final var re = getReal().multiply(factor.getReal(), mathContext)
172            .subtract(getImaginary().multiply(factor.getImaginary(), mathContext), mathContext);
173        final var im = getReal().multiply(factor.getImaginary(), mathContext)
174            .add(getImaginary().multiply(factor.getReal(), mathContext), mathContext);
175        return new BigComplex(re, im);
176    }
177
178    @Override
179    public @NotNull BigComplex divide(final @NotNull BigComplex divisor) {
180        requireNonNull(divisor, "divisor");
181        checkArgument(divisor.isInvertible(), "divisor expected to be invertible but divisor = %s", divisor);
182        final var den = divisor.getReal().pow(2).add(divisor.getImaginary().pow(2));
183        final var re = getReal().multiply(divisor.getReal()).add(getImaginary().multiply(divisor.getImaginary()))
184            .divide(den, MathContext.DECIMAL128);
185        final var im = getImaginary().multiply(divisor.getReal()).subtract(getReal().multiply(divisor.getImaginary()))
186            .divide(den, MathContext.DECIMAL128);
187        return new BigComplex(re, im);
188    }
189
190    /**
191     * Calculates the quotient
192     *
193     * @param divisor divisor
194     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
195     * @return quotient
196     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code divisor == null}
197     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when divisor is not invertible
198     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
199     * @since 0.0.1
200     */
201    public @NotNull BigComplex divide(final @NotNull BigComplex divisor, final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
202        requireNonNull(divisor, "divisor");
203        checkArgument(divisor.isInvertible(), "divisor expected to be invertible but divisor = %s", divisor);
204        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
205        final var den =
206            divisor.getReal().pow(2, mathContext).add(divisor.getImaginary().pow(2, mathContext), mathContext);
207        final var re = getReal().multiply(divisor.getReal(), mathContext)
208            .add(getImaginary().multiply(divisor.getImaginary(), mathContext), mathContext).divide(den, mathContext);
209        final var im = getImaginary().multiply(divisor.getReal(), mathContext)
210            .subtract(getReal().multiply(divisor.getImaginary(), mathContext), mathContext).divide(den, mathContext);
211        return new BigComplex(re, im);
212    }
213
214    @Override
215    public @NotNull BigComplex pow(final int exponent) {
216        if (exponent < 0) {
217            return multiply(pow(-exponent - 1)).invert();
218        }
219        if (exponent > 0) {
220            return multiply(pow(exponent - 1));
221        }
222        return ONE;
223    }
224
225    /**
226     * Calculates the power
227     *
228     * @param exponent exponent
229     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
230     * @return power
231     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
232     * @since 0.0.1
233     */
234    public @NotNull BigComplex pow(final int exponent, final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
235        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
236        if (exponent < 0) {
237            return multiply(pow(-exponent - 1, mathContext), mathContext).invert(mathContext);
238        }
239        if (exponent > 0) {
240            return multiply(pow(exponent - 1, mathContext), mathContext);
241        }
242        return ONE;
243    }
244
245    @Override
246    public @NotNull BigComplex negate() {
247        return new BigComplex(getReal().negate(), getImaginary().negate());
248    }
249
250    /**
251     * Calculates the negated
252     *
253     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
254     * @return negated
255     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
256     * @since 0.0.1
257     */
258    public @NotNull BigComplex negate(final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
259        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
260        return new BigComplex(getReal().negate(mathContext), getImaginary().negate(mathContext));
261    }
262
263    @Override
264    public @NotNull BigComplex invert() {
265        checkState(isInvertible(), "this expected to be invertible but this = %s", this);
266        return ONE.divide(this);
267    }
268
269    /**
270     * Calculates the inverted
271     *
272     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
273     * @return inverted
274     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
275     * @since 0.0.1
276     */
277    public @NotNull BigComplex invert(final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
278        checkState(isInvertible(), "this expected to be invertible but this = %s", this);
279        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
280        return ONE.divide(this, mathContext);
281    }
282
283    @Override
284    public @NotNull BigDecimal abs() {
285        return absPow2().sqrt(MathContext.DECIMAL128);
286    }
287
288    /**
289     * Calculates the absolute value
290     *
291     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
292     * @return absolute value
293     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
294     * @since 0.0.1
295     */
296    public @NotNull BigDecimal abs(final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
297        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
298        return absPow2(mathContext).sqrt(mathContext);
299    }
300
301    @Override
302    public @NotNull BigComplex conjugate() {
303        return new BigComplex(getReal(), getImaginary().negate());
304    }
305
306    /**
307     * Calculates the conjugate
308     *
309     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
310     * @return conjugate
311     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
312     * @since 0.0.1
313     */
314    public @NotNull BigComplex conjugate(final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
315        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
316        return new BigComplex(getReal(), getImaginary().negate(mathContext));
317    }
318
319    @Override
320    public @NotNull BigDecimal argument() {
321        checkState(isInvertible(), "this expected to be invertible but this = %s", this);
322        final var acos = BigDecimalMath.acos(getReal().divide(abs(), MathContext.DECIMAL128), MathContext.DECIMAL128);
323        return getImaginary().compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) < 0 ? acos.negate() : acos;
324    }
325
326    /**
327     * Calculates the argument
328     *
329     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
330     * @return argument
331     * @throws IllegalStateException when this is not invertible
332     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
333     * @since 0.0.1
334     */
335    public @NotNull BigDecimal argument(final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
336        checkState(isInvertible(), "this expected to be invertible but this = %s", this);
337        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
338        final var acos = BigDecimalMath.acos(getReal().divide(abs(), mathContext), mathContext);
339        return getImaginary().compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) < 0 ? acos.negate(mathContext) : acos;
340    }
341
342    @Override
343    public @NotNull BigInteger toBigInteger() {
344        return getReal().toBigInteger();
345    }
346
347    /**
348     * Returns this as exact {@link BigInteger}
349     *
350     * @return {@link BigInteger}
351     * @throws ArithmeticException when real part is not an exact {@link BigInteger}
352     * @since 0.0.1
353     */
354    public @NotNull BigInteger toBigIntegerExact() {
355        return getReal().toBigIntegerExact();
356    }
357
358    @Override
359    public @NotNull BigDecimal toBigDecimal() {
360        return getReal();
361    }
362
363    @Override
364    public @NotNull BigPolarForm toPolarForm() {
365        return new BigPolarForm(abs(), argument());
366    }
367
368    /**
369     * Returns this as polar form
370     *
371     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
372     * @return polar form
373     * @throws IllegalStateException when this is not invertible
374     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
375     * @since 0.0.1
376     */
377    public @NotNull BigPolarForm toPolarForm(final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
378        return new BigPolarForm(abs(mathContext), argument(mathContext));
379    }
380
381    @Override
382    public boolean equalsByComparing(final @NotNull BigComplex other) {
383        requireNonNull(other, "other");
384        return getReal().compareTo(other.getReal()) == 0 && getImaginary().compareTo(other.getImaginary()) == 0;
385    }
386
387    @Override
388    protected @NotNull BigDecimal absPow2() {
389        return getReal().pow(2).add(getImaginary().pow(2));
390    }
391
392    private BigDecimal absPow2(final MathContext mathContext) {
393        return getReal().pow(2, mathContext).add(getImaginary().pow(2, mathContext), mathContext);
394    }
395}
